messages.body: Hi there, I've reached the $50 threshold for creator verification but haven't received any notification about account review. My digital art templates have been selling well, but I can't access the earnings without verification. Could you check the status of my account review?

Hi there,

Thank you for reaching out about your account verification status. I can see that your account has met the earnings threshold for verification. The verification process typically takes 3-5 business days once triggered.

To ensure a smooth verification process, please check that you have:

1. Completed your tax information
2. Added valid payout details (bank account or PayPal)
3. Provided a clear description of your products
4. Updated your creator profile

If you've completed all these steps, I'll escalate your verification review to our compliance team. They'll prioritize reviewing your account within the next 24-48 hours.

Best regards,
Emily
